help:
Here are some things you can ask me:
- 'hello'
- 'who made you'
- 'what can you do'
- 'how do i register'
- 'how do i add a profile'
- 'how do i logout'
who made you: I was made by Vito Herce using React.
what can you do: I can help answer questions about using this profile app.
how do i register: Click on the 'Register' link in the navbar and fill in your credentials.
how do i login: Go to the Login page and enter your username and password.
how do i logout: Click the 'Logout' button in the navbar when you're logged in.
how do i add a profile: Navigate to 'Add Profile' (only visible when logged in), fill out the form, and submit it!
how do i edit my profile: Go to your profile, and if you're logged in, click 'Edit Profile'.
